question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding Convention on the Conservation of Migratory Species of Wild Animals?
1. Appendix I of the convention lists migratory species that are endangered or threatened with extinction.
2. Appendix II of the convention lists migratory species which have an unfavourable conservation status and which require international agreements for their conservation and management.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Appendix I of the Convention on the Conservation of Migratory Species of Wild Animals lists migratory species that are endangered or threatened with extinction. Appendix II of the convention lists migratory species which have an unfavourable conservation status and which require international agreements for their conservation and management.
